languages.text: Силы Нургла даруют щит, который добавляет +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Снять щит можно, если снизить временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} существа до 0.
languages.original_text: Nurgle powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are lowered to 0.

languages.text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.
languages.original_text: Силы Нургла даруют щит, который добавляет +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Снять щит можно, если снизить временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} существа до 0.

traits.locale_text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.
Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.
Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.

languages.text: ナーグルのパワーはそのホストに3の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を与えるシールドを作り、生物の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0になると取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.

traits.locale_text: ナーグルのパワーはそのホストに3の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を与えるシールドを作り、生物の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0になると取り除かれる。

languages.text: 纳垢的力量守护着宿主，使宿主获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，护盾当该生物的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时失效。
languages.original_text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.

traits.locale_text: 纳垢的力量守护着宿主，使宿主获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，护盾当该生物的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时失效。

languages.text: Los poderes de Nurgle crean un escudo que proporciona a su anfitrión +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que desaparece si las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales de la criatura bajan a 0.
languages.original_text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.

traits.locale_text: Los poderes de Nurgle crean un escudo que proporciona a su anfitrión +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que desaparece si las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales de la criatura bajan a 0.

languages.text: Die Kräfte von Nurgle schaffen einen Schild, der dem Wirt +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} gewährt und entfernt wird, wenn die temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Kreatur auf 0 fallen.
languages.original_text: Nurgle's powers create a shield that grants its host +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and will be removed if the creature's temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach 0.

traits.locale_text: Die Kräfte von Nurgle schaffen einen Schild, der dem Wirt +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} gewährt und entfernt wird, wenn die temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Kreatur auf 0 fallen.

languages.text: Les pouvoirs de Nurgle créent un bouclier qui confère à son hôte +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et qui disparaît si les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires de la créature atteignent 0.
